params._nftCollection: - The address of the ERC721 Collection.
params._rewardsToken: - The address of the ERC20 Token.

deposit(uint256[]).details: Each Token Id must be approved for transfer by the user before calling this function.

params._tokenIds: - The array of Token Ids to deposit.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._tokenIds: - The array of Token Ids to withdraw.

nftCollection.details: The ERC721 Collection that will be staked.

rewardsToken.details: The ERC20 Reward Token that will be distributed to stakers.

stakerAddress.details: Mapping of Token Id to staker address.

claimRewards(uint256).notice: Function used to claim the accrued ERC20 Reward Tokens.

constructor.notice: Constructor function that initializes the ERC20 and ERC721 interfaces.

deposit(uint256[]).notice: Function used to deposit ERC721 Tokens.

withdraw(uint256[]).notice: Function used to withdraw ERC721 Tokens.
